DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness safety Olopatadine Hydrochloride ( HCl ) ophthalmic solution 0.1 % versus Epinastine HCl ophthalmic solution , 0.05 % population healthy , adult Japanese patient ( 20 year age old ) history allergic conjunctivitis Japanese Cedar Pollen . Patients randomly assign receive Olopatadine HCl ophthalmic solution , 0.1 % one eye Epinastine HCl ophthalmic solution , 0.05 % fellow eye , conjunctival allergy challenge ( CAC ) Japanese cedar pollen perform .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Olopatadine HCl Ophthalmic Solution Treatment Allergic Conjunctivitis Japan
DOC.criteria: Be Japanese live Japan ; History allergic conjunctivitis ; Positive skin test reaction Japanese cedar Visit 1 ; Positive bilateral CAC reaction allergen Visit 1 Visit 2 ; Able willing avoid disallow medication specified period ; Able discontinue wear contact lens specified period ; Sign Informed Consent ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History hypersensitivity study drug compound ; Any ocular condition , opinion investigator , could affect patient 's safety ; Ocular surgical intervention within 3 month refractive surgery within 6 month prior start study ; Presence active ocular infection ; Use disallow medication specify protocol ; Pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
